Introduction

SKINZ is a seven-member virtual idol boy group under Bridge Entertainment. They made their debut with the digital single "Young & Loud" on April 10, 2025.

Their group name is an abbreviation for "Synthetic Kinetic Infinite Next-gen Zenith" which means they are next generation artists with infinite possibilities and break boundaries between virtual and reality.
